div.div: 1. Worker gets a small amount of randomness for every transaction that's submitted on the Ethereum chain

switch.text: 1. Worker gets a small amount o...

div.div: 2. Worker independently determines if there's a winner according to the transaction hash and randomness

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 245px; margin-left: 131px;

div.div: 3. Worker calls the contract to declare the transaction hash the winner using the rng, a merkle proof, block header and receipt
